评论概述: Two sizes too small and are not a capri cut.
评论详情: These are not capri style; and run two sizes too small. The fabric is a cheap polyester. They are made and shipped from China.

I really want to like these and may get a different size...they run small.  They are 100% polyester, not linen!  The fish design is huge so the fish look like they are literally heading to your crotch.  They are lightweight and may be comfortable.
Fit is perfect (I’m 5’2 and ordered a small. The fabric is nice and very lightweight without being see-through. The design is really nice.
